item.title: About this course 002
item.description: I took this course to improve my grades for CS-E4100. My professor suggested me to complete DevOps course to gain more grades, I liked the course as I got depth knowledge about: DevOps culture CI/CD pipeline CAMS Model How to automate the process How the DevOps has different practices than traditional software development. I liked the way the course was organized, videos provided the depth knowledge and quizzes help us to try the knowledge we gain so far.
